name: The League of Gentlemen (Christmas Special)

eps.name: Yule Never Leave!
eps.desc: Bernice listens to three different disturbing tales: Charlie talks about a recurring nightmare involving Stella and a voodoo spell; a tramp talks about how he came to suspect that Herr Lipp was a vampire; Mr Chinnery recounts how his great-grandfather became infected with an ancestral curse which now affects him after an incident with monkey balls.

relations.title: The League of Gentlemen Anniversary Specials
